show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Ray McGovern
content: Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips discuss Israel, Iran, and American Empire. <!--more--> Special guest Ray McGovern, co-creator of Veteran Intelligence Professionals for Sanity (VIPS) and former CIA analyst will be on for most of the program; at the bottom of the hour we’ll break for Project Censored’s Validated Independent News with student intern Kimberly Soeiro and special guest musical artist Andrew Mena Elsonbaty; the show concludes with activist and Peace and Freedom Party VP candidate Cindy Sheehan about the Labor Day Chevron Press Conference/Rally “Enough Is Enough- Nationalize Chevron Under Worker-Community Control and Prosecute The Criminals Running This Out Of Control Empire.”
